ScenarioDescription: Print Electronics menu and its sub-menu
TestCaseDescription:
Kindly follow below steps :
● Go to Flipkart website ‘https://www.flipkart.com/’
● You will get a login pop-up.
● No need to login and click on the close icon and cancel the login pop-up
● Now you will see some banners, and it will change randomly.
● Click on any banner
● Click on any banner, and you will see a horizontal menu with ‘Electronics’.
● Hover on it, and you will see a list of mobile brands.
● Need to print all the mobile brands as per below format on console :
